Text: thanx once more for helping to keep my 3yr old happy
Your welcome wormtooth, thank you for taking the time and effort to comment and say thank you.   It means a lot and is very much appreciated.

Thanx for the sharing Strider2004! 
My son love this program, he sits on the couch in the morning screaming his commands at the TV (as only a 3 year old can), in English by the way, which I find to be most amusing since we are Norwegians!  I show off Storm (my Kid) to my friends, speaking to him in english.. and he answers correctly!  sweeeet....*smirkin*  
 "oh.. havent YOUR kid learned to speak english YET?! Well, really! he must be almost 3! honestly!"
